How-to-update-site-using-Quartz.content:
Whenever you want to update site:
1ï¸âƒ£ Add / edit notes inside:
quartz-site/content

2ï¸âƒ£ Build site:
npx quartz build --output docs

3ï¸âƒ£ Push:
git add .
git commit -m "update"
git push

Done.
Site updates in ~1 minute.
